rules.title: Gram Panchayat Rules
rules.1: Gram Sabha must be conducted every three months.
rules.2: Proper utilization of Gram Panchayat funds is essential.
rules.3: Villagers' cooperation is needed for cleanliness and environmental protection.
rules.4: Transparency in Gram Panchayat decision-making is required.
rules.5: Regular maintenance of schools, hospitals, and other public services is necessary.
